name: B. A Prosperous Lot
statement:
Big Banban is hesitating over the amount of money to give out. He
considers loops to be lucky since it symbolizes unity and harmony.He
would like to find a positive integer not greater than , such that there
are exactly in the decimal representation of , or determine that such
does not exist.A is a planar area enclosed by lines in the digits’
decimal representation written in Arabic numerals. For example, there is
one loop in digit , two loops in and no loops in . Refer to the figure
below for all exact forms.
